name: OfferMax
tag_list: rewards, offers, campaigns, loyalty, activation, retention
overview:
Aim: to be India’s Most Powerful Rewards Program

OfferMax is an alliance program that has been designed to go beyond the top brands. It aspires to be relevant to a large chunk of consumers and partner with lifestyle category players who are in the neighborhood of the customers.

At OfferMax, we understand that an alliance program can only be successful if it works closely with its partner to help/assist them in understanding how their customers behave and provide them with tools to address the opportunities/challenges.

With OfferMax, partner merchants not only get a flexible loyalty program, they get regular reports on whats happening and have access to a robust campaign management platform to talk to customers in a targeted way.
